column5: Went out fishing Saturday and caught this.  It is a new PB pike.  The pic does not do it justice as it was super thick and had a belly full of something. Sorry about the hold so far up on the gill plate.  I am not used to holding these big pike.  Will do a better job next time.  I put her back in the water very quickly and she swam away immediately so everything was good.
Nice fish Man ! Congrats
X2.  WTG
Nice post in awhile dude.
beauty pike!  did you measure it?
Sweet fish,exactly what I'm looking for!!!!
NICE... Well done.
Very very nice indeed, well done !!
Nice fish. Looks like a solid 33-34".
Forget the hold,  those sunglasses are shameful.
Nice pike Chris!  That thing is thick!

yup she's a beaut....I have a picture of me posing with a decent musky and I'm exhibiting a similar awkward grip. I set the fish briefly in the water to change the positioning of my hands and BAM she took off 110 miles an hour! Never got a good pic but there is one fish you know survived the battle!
Nice catch man
Hey Cudz  That is a very nice Fish!!  Well done  Nothing wrong with the 'Hold'  Thanks for posting Rick
Are you serious?
LOL ya beat me to it.  Solid 40.  nuff said.

LOL Rob. Those are one of a kind custom Oakleys. Chrome white (they only made one batch and I had to wait over 8 months for them).  with yellow emblem and yellow stem sleeves. Now generally white glasses are for DBs but the polarised lens in these are the best I have ever fished so they are my fishing glasses. (They are also custom etched on the lens with 'Keeping it real') Might have to remember to take them off next time before pic is taken.
That's a low 40s fish for sure, lol @ 34incher.
Very nice gator, big shoulders on that girl
Great lookin fish!
It's a monster!!!  Congrats on the PB!!!!
Woohoo, congrats Chris!!!
Awesome pike! Is that from lake Simcoe?
